name: Privasim
description:
Privasim is a simulator game where you play as an app company, collect users, mine data, and sell data to get rich. Avoid cyber attacks, fight legal battles and get Influencers to join your app.

Tutorial

use WASD or arrow keys to move your player.

Collect users!

Mine their data!

Sell their data to get rich!



Privasim is being made by 1 person. I am looking for publishers and partnerships to help me develop this game.

You may contact me below :)

Email| Twitter| Reddit
